name: Kunto Aji
description:
'''Kunto Aji Wibisono''' (born 4 January 1987) is an Indonesian singer and songwriter. He took part in the [[Indonesian Idol season 5|fifth season]] of ''[[Indonesian Idol]]'' in 2008 and finished fourth.

He had his breakthrough after releasing his debut single, "Terlalu Lama Sendiri" in 2014, followed by his debut studio album ''Generation Y'' a year later.
